column1: Consumer Attitudes Toward Data Breach Notifications and Loss of Personal Information
column8: The survey was conducted using the American Life Panel, a nationally representative panel of more than 6,000 adults who participate in Internet-based surveys covering a diverse set of issues. Fielded between May 15 and June 1, 2015, the survey was designed to provide a snapshot of the frequency of breach notifications and the types of data compromised, as well as consumer reactions to the breach, the notification process, and the affected company. Our survey was fielded between May 14 and June 1, 2015, to 2,618 adults.
